content:
1. "What challenges are you currently facing in your business?"
2. "Can you tell me more about your current process/solution?"
3. "How do you envision this product/service fitting into your operations?"
4. "What specific needs do you have that our product/service can address?"
5. "Can you walk me through a recent project you completed and any pain points you experienced?"
6. "What is your budget for this project/purchase?"
7. "What kind of ROI are you looking to achieve with this product/service?"
8. "What are the decision-making criteria for this purchase?"
9. "Can you tell me about the other vendors/solutions you are considering?"
10. "What is your timeline for making a decision on this product/service?"
